title: UFYB 215: Orgasm-Blocking Thoughts with August McLaughlin
itunes:title: Orgasm-Blocking Thoughts with August McLaughlin
description:
Your biggest obstacle to mind-blowing pleasure isn’t your partner’s inability to find your g-spot or your inability to find a partner or your limited drawer of sex toys...it’s actually your thoughts.

 

If you find yourself stressing about your appearance during sex (solo or with a partner!), worrying about your partner’s pleasure more than your own, or feeling like your desire is dependent on whether someone desires you, tune in to this interview with August McLaughlin from Girl Boner Radio. In it, we explore some common orgasm-blocking thoughts, and how to rewire your brain so you can jump-start your libido.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/215
content:encoded:

itunes:subtitle: How to create desire and the feeling of being desirable for yourself.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
